title: 116 - 2021 Death Pool
description: On today's show, the boys dive into the 2021 Death Pool and make their selections and remind the listeners that being picked in the Death Pool is actually the kiss of life. They also take a look at some of the most anticipated movies that are coming out in 2021, learn more about racer pigeons, Mitt gives an update on when he will be moving into The Pub from his current scumhole, they dive into a lighter Pod FOD (send in your questions and submissions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram), and Nick closes out the episode with a few more selections for Friday Bangerz. We appreciate you all for listening, have a fantastic weekend, we'll see you Wednesday.
dc:creator: The Pod
